name: @indexers/the-graph-flow
description: The Graph indexer for Sablier Flow

scripts.deploy-external:form: CHAIN=form bun run setup && graph deploy sablier-flow-form --node https://formapi.0xgraph.xyz/deploy --ipfs https://formapi.0xgraph.xyz/ipfs --deploy-key
scripts.deploy-external:ultra-command: CHAIN=ultra bun run setup && graph deploy --node https://graph.evm.ultra.io --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --headers "$ULTRA_HEADERS" sablier-flow-ultra
scripts.deploy-external:xdc: CHAIN=xdc bun run setup && graph deploy --node https://graph.xinfin.network/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ xdc/sablier-flow-xdc
